title: Need help on identifying this typeface
content:
Can anybody identify this typeface? I really like it and am currently doing an A level project and need to know what its called- i found it in the Little White Lies magazine if that has any relevance or help. Regards Sam

the attachment has a pic of it in the mag

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [post.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/typophile.com/files/post.jpg) | 487.04 KB |

 [‹ body typefaces that compliment Carter's Galliard CC](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38585 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans serif full face to work with Sackers Gothic. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38588 "Go to next forum topic")
author: smegger

comments.content: Very similar to [Baby Teeth](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2547) by Milton Glaser, but different in some specifics. Could easily be a custom job for that magazine - it wouldn’t be hard to bang something out, given the idea.

One of the many trendy faces currently spreading like a virus throughout today’s design. This list may help:

[Black Boton Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/black_boton_bold/)  
 [Frank](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.neutura.org/Frank.html)  
 [Deuce](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.neutura.org/Deuce.html)  
 [Mostra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/mostra_blk_one_two_three/)  
 [Blocks](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/blocks/?sample_text=TOTALLY%20NU%20RAVE&sample_size=36)  
 [Alpha Bloc Sculpture](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/alpha_bloc_sculpture/)  
 [FF Extra](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_extra/)  
 [Unovis](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/unovis_regular_ot/)  
 [Neutrino](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.neutura.org/Neutrino.html)  
 [Toch](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/lamosca.com/)  
 [NB Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typografie/3/NBBlock%E2%84%A2/1310/1)  
 [Acton](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/acton/)  
 [Bebit](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?fcode=TM_BBT&letter=B) (Cyrillic version of Milton Glaser’s Baby Teeth)  
 [Parkitecture](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/parkitecture/regular/?refby=typographica)  
 [Wagner Silhouette](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/wagner-silhouette-nf/)  
 [Rody](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/rody/?refby=typographica) and [Lazar](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/?refby=typographica)  
 [Cooter](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=NzA=)  
 [Douff](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/2rebels/doufff/)  
 [Chumbitos](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fictilia/chumbitos/?refby=typographica)

Free  
 [Spokes](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/down10.com/fonts/spokes.html)  
 [Disco Deck](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=disco_deck)  
 [Pacmania Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/1580)  
 [Fatti Patti](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/d_h.htm) (lame version of Baby Teeth)  
 [Lovers Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Pimp](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTF/Pimp)  
 [FS Pele](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontsmith.com/fonts.php?font_num=675)

Custom  
 [Non-Format](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.non-format.com/) created a bunch of these for their design work.

Soft and Round  
 [Deuce Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.neutura.org/DeuceRound.html)  
 [Copal](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/copal_std_ot/)  
 [NB Rund](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typography/3/NBFett%E2%84%A2/1044/1)  
 [Umma Gommma](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Gusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/gusto/)  
 [Fatty](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=MTIw)  
 [Milford](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/handel_sans_bold_oblique/?refby=typographica)

Other Variations  
 [Sinaloa](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/sinaloa/)

Nice list Stephen, but don’t forget Mostra Black.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/")
Guys, this stuff is awesome, will be putting this stuff, especially the Baby Teeth by Glaser in my folder work for research, thanks!
